text: Rugmini is a 1989 Indian Malayalam film, directed by KP Kumaran, starring Nedumudi Venu and Anju in the lead roles. Kumaran won the Kerala State Film Award for Best Director for the film. ==Cast== * Nedumudi Venu * Anju * Innocent * Ashokan * Sreenivasan * Mavelikkara Ponnamma ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 films Category:Indian films Category:1980s Malayalam-language films
title: Rugmini
